relation: Different things, everyone is different. But there is almost something for every type of person.
The food is alright, you will get tired of it soon. Make sure you enjoy your parents meal and cherish it before coming to school.
Dorm life is really good, you get to meet a lot of new people.
The profs I have had, have been strict and very helpful.
Decent school with basic amenities. Some of the professors are good and some bad ones.
pageTitle: St. Cloud State University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {312258=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 249823=They have really strict rules. You always have to have you student ID with you after 7:00PM, 124473=Food is not great. There is a few different options but when I attended school there 2007-2009 I wasn't impressed with the options. There is also a Subway and Dominos but I personally don't like either. The Dining Hall had a few different options like a salad bar and a sandwich station but nothing is great., 186873=Sober living...AA meetings. Great idea just not a big turn out back in 2004-2005.}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Kellie from Fargo, ND 07/05/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 11 out of 11 people found this review useful. 2 of 73 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Anyone and everyone. There are students from all over the world, many different backgrounds, and perspectives on life. I guarantee you will find someone just like you. Tips for prospective students SCSU is known for it's partying, and there is a lot of that going on at campus but stay focused and remember that you are in college to get an education for your future. You have the rest of your life to party so don't waste the money on tuition if you're not going to try. Bang for the buck The education is exactly what I would expect for what I pay. The price is very reasonable compared to other campus' around the area. All in all, you get what you work for. So if you want
